name: Mohamed Yusuf
executiveSummary: 4+ years of software engineering experience, specialising in building secure applications using Java, Python and C++

description: Developed and maintained scalable web applications using Java and Spring Boot.
Led a team to design a microservices architecture for a cloud-based solution.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time by 50.

Elevated user interfaces, achieving a 40% increase in user engagement through expert application of ReactJS, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Demonstrated superior front-end development skills and user experience focus.
Led the seamless integration of VCS automation and CI/CD pipelines, enhancing team productivity by 30% and ensuring bug-free code with a commitment to TDD principles.

Spearheaded the rapid development and delivery of 5 application iterations within a tight deadline, showcasing agility
and responsiveness to organizational needs.

Secured a critical system vulnerability, fortifying web security and safeguarding sensitive data, reflecting a proactive
approach to cybersecurity and technical proficiency.

experiences.position: Junior Software Engineer / Service Management Intern
description: Slashed service request response time from average of 13 days to 3 hours by developing security approval automation.
Successfully led the development of an observability system for 32 product components to achieve multi-fold performance improvements within 4 months.
Led Apache Kafka integration, boosting transaction throughput by 300%, setting a new fintech industry standard.
Worked extensively within the back-end team to deliver important stories using Spring Boot Java and Apache Kafka.

Spearheaded the development of a feature-rich, internal tool that automated the previously manual process of code deployment, reducing the deployment time by 75% and significantly increasing the development team's efficiency and productivity.

experiences.position: Junior Software Engineer / Service Management Intern
description: Successfully led the development of an observability system for 32 product components to achieve multi-fold performance improvements within 4 months.

projects.name: CV Maker
projects.premise: The process of tailoring ones CV for different job applications is tedious and time consuming.
description: Implemented a user-friendly front-end portal for seamless portfolio management and JSON file population.
Enabled dynamic CV content selection, allowing users to tailor their resumes effortlessly for diverse job applications.
Automated PDF CV generation with customizable LaTeX templates, streamlining the resume creation process.

projects.name: Sudoku Solver
projects.premise: Solving Sudoku puzzles rapidly and accurately with an automated Python solution, bypassing human error and time constraints.
description: Utilised backtracking to achieve efficient puzzle resolution by systematically exploring all possible solutions for each cell.
